Flavours Themes

These are all the Flavours themes I’ve created for the Mac customizing application, Flavours.

Created Saturday - August 9, 2014

1 minute read ∙ 88 words

0 Comments

These are all the Flavours themes I’ve created for the Mac customizing application, Flavours.

View all my themes at my author profile located at store.interacto.net/flavours/toprated?author=2156.

Unfortunately, Flavours will be not be continuing with Apple’s new El Capitan OSX update, but it was fun while it lasted.

Baby Pink

Created September 2014.

The Black Apple

Created August 2014.

Snow White

Created August 2014.

Alienware - Black and White

Created August 2014.

Alienware - Black

Created May 2014.

Alienware - White

Created May 2014.

Alienware - Red

Created May 2014.
